title: ILoop2.RevolvePlanarLoop
description: Creates a body by revolving a planar loop around an axis.
signature:
System.Object RevolvePlanarLoop( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
,
   System.Double
Axisx
,
   System.Double
Axisy
,
   System.Double
Axisz
,
   System.Double
RevAngle
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate of the axis point

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate of the axis point

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z coordinate of the axis point

returns: Array containing new body (element 1) and two stop faces (elements 2 and 3)
